snippet: The Spurs’ last chance to tie Game 5 of the Western Conference Finals — a fall-away 3-point attempt by Manu Ginobili — contrasted sharply with the Thunder’s elevation and athleticism throughout.
abstract: Harvey Araton On Pro Basketball column on San Antonio Spurs loss to Oklahoma City Thunder in Game 5 of Western Conference finals; holds that the Spurs last possession, in which Manu Ginobili missed a three-pointer, put a magnifying glass to the crack in their aging infrastructure.
lead_paragraph: The Spurs’ last chance to tie Game 5 of the Western Conference Finals — a fall-away 3-point attempt by Manu Ginobili — contrasted sharply with the Thunder’s elevation and athleticism throughout.

headline.seo: 2012 N.B.A. Playoffs — Spurs Miss That Spring in Their Step
headline.main: Aging Spurs Miss a Spring in Their Step
headline.print_headline: Aging Spurs Miss A Spring in Their Step
